trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfigurationCreated?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised when the first HTTP module in the web application references the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfigurationCreated?displayProperty=fullName>Web 應用程式中的第一個 HTTP 模組參考時，就會引發事件<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfigurationCreated?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The first access of the this property causes a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> object to be created and initialized from configuration.
trans-unit.target: 第一次存取這個屬性的原因<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>加以建立，並從設定初始化的物件。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>

trans-unit.source: You can access the newly created <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> object through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property in an event handler in order to examine or modify it.
trans-unit.target: 您可以存取新建立的<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>物件，可透過<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性中的事件處理常式，以便檢查或修改它。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified federation configuration object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs"></xref>與指定的同盟設定物件的類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A> property to the federation configuration object specified by `config`.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A>屬性所指定的同盟設定物件`config`。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"></xref> object contains the configurable properties for the WS-Federation Authentication Module (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule"></xref>) and the Session Authentication Module (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule"></xref>) in a web application.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"> </xref>物件的 WS-同盟驗證模組包含可設定的屬性 (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule"></xref>) 和工作階段驗證模組 (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule"></xref>) web 應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the federation configuration object that was initialized from the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定初始的同盟設定物件，從組態檔。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> object contains the configurable properties for the WS-Federation Authentication Module (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule>) and the Session Authentication Module (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule>) in a web application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>物件的 WS-同盟驗證模組包含可設定的屬性 (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule>) 和工作階段驗證模組 (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule>) web 應用程式中。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>

trans-unit.source: To modify the configuration settings, you can set properties on the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> object that is referenced by this property, or you can provide an new <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要修改的組態設定，您可以設定屬性上<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>物件所參考的這個屬性，或者您可以提供新<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>物件。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>

trans-unit.source: The federation configuration object that was initialized from configuration.
trans-unit.target: 從設定初始化同盟組態物件。
